Waffles are, quite simply, the most perfect breakfast food. — KD

Charging iMessage with murder

Charging iMessage with murder — The Wall Street Journal reports that the Department of Justice told Apple that “the company [Apple] could eventually be directly responsible for the death of a child,” because iMessage encryption would prevent law enforcement from reading messages on a suspects phone.

Published 18 November 2014

Enjoy your day.
